name: team-062-yourright
description: barebones setup for JavaScript / Node projects replace this with a one-liner phrase describing this project or app

scripts.start-app-dev: concurrently 'cd server && npm run dev && cd ..' 'cd client && npm start && cd ..'
scripts.install-packages: cd server && npm install && cd .. && cd client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd .. && cd client && npm test && cd ..
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.coverage: cd server && npm run coverage && cd .. && cd client && npm run coverage && cd ..
